metadata.title: CVE-2021-47411 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: allow conditional reschedule for intensive iteratorsIf we have a lot of threads and rings, the tctx list can get quite big.This is especially true if we keep creating new threads and rings.Likewise for the provided buffers list. Be nice and insert a conditionalreschedule point while iterating the nodes for deletion.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
